rationales.achievement: She is strongly outcome-focused, citing data and route performance she worked months to produce.
rationales.self_direction: In the meeting she backs down and accepts cosmetic edits instead of defending her judgment.

rationales.achievement: She stays late analyzing service failures because she feels responsible for results.
rationales.benevolence: She lets family calls and New Year's plans drop to keep working.

rationales.self_direction: She designs a pilot she can run herself instead of waiting for permission.
rationales.achievement: The pilot is built to produce measurable cost reductions and operational proof.

rationales.self_direction: She independently executes and broadcasts the pilot results.
rationales.conformity: She bypasses expected reporting hierarchy by sending data to the full ops chat.
rationales.achievement: She tracks and publicizes concrete delivery-time gains to drive adoption.
She quickly supplies full data and seeks validation that the work counts at higher levels.
She treats the regional presentation as a performance challenge and prepares intensely.

rationales.conformity: She copies Diego's format to fit perceived leadership expectations.
rationales.self_direction: She feels misaligned because she is suppressing her own style for approval.

rationales.achievement: Her dilemma is about whether to temper ambition despite strong results and effort.
She finalizes a tightly sourced presentation and rehearses timing for high-quality delivery.

rationales.self_direction: She chooses to defend authorship of her work rather than concede credit.
rationales.conformity: She rejects the norm of keeping peace by quietly adding Diego's name.

rationales.achievement: The successful presentation validates sustained high-performance execution.
rationales.power: She is given authority to lead a multi-country optimization group.
